channel.title: [PICS] Something went horribly wrong! - READ [PICS]
channel.description:
Hello everyone, im having a horrible problem, I was running my server and it was going great then the other night my internet decided to crash and didnt work for like a half hour. Finally it started working and the server was running all night. The next morning I log on and no one is on, my friend texts me and says hey why is the server down.. im like it is.? So we teamview and it shows he cant connect aswell as everyone else. I checked my router settings, my computer Ip is still the same, no-ip is all right, but no one can connect? Can someone please help me on what the problem is? I completly factory reset my router, and re-port-fowarded and still nothing is fixed!! =( and No-ip doesent seem to update the Ip on the deskop even when I refresh, Please Help fast!!
[IMG]http://i302.photobucket.com/albums/nn119/PhotoCrazzy/PF.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i302.photobucket.com/albums/nn119/PhotoCrazzy/NO-IP.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i302.photobucket.com/albums/nn119/PhotoCrazzy/NO-IP2.png[/img]

item.title: [PICS] Something went horribly wrong! - READ [PICS]
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

[quote=“Dhfhy1, post:8, topic:372250”][quote author=Your Master link=topic=468306.msg3423739#msg3423739 date=1291748345]

Did you turn off your firewall so people can connect?

If you have teamviewer I might be able to help you out, just PM me the ID & pass.
Yes I did.

Try running on your real IP without no-ip to find out your IP go to: http://www.whatismyip.com/ Then go to google add the server with the IP and remember while doing it let the server run. If it’s being added then it works.
[/quote]

Its Still telling me offline and it wont post.[/quote]

Read full topic

Did you turn off your firewall so people can connect?

Yes I did.
[/quote]
Try running on your real IP without no-ip to find out your IP go to: http://www.whatismyip.com/ Then go to google add the server with the IP and remember while doing it let the server run. If it’s being added then it works.[/quote]

Its Still telling me offline and it wont post.

item.title: [PICS] Something went horribly wrong! - READ [PICS]
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

[quote=“Dhfhy1, post:6, topic:372250”][quote author=Your Master link=topic=468306.msg3423732#msg3423732 date=1291747811]
Did you turn off your firewall so people can connect?
[/quote]

Yes I did.[/quote]
Try running on your real IP without no-ip to find out your IP go to: http://www.whatismyip.com/ Then go to Runelocus add the server with the IP and remember while doing it let the server run. If it’s being added then it works.

Read full topic
